review: It would be nice if this could mirror my laptop or phone.
author: Pen Name

review: Easy to set up, easy to navigate, great picture quality! I bought a chromcast stick a few months ago and wasn't thrilled with it so I purchased the fire stick and there is no comparison. I would recommend this to anyone wanting to turn your tv into a smart TV
author: Mce4562

review: Good product. Some hotels require you contact their server to unlock the set so you can use it.
author: JBHendrix

review: easy to hook up, movies show instantly very happy with it!
author: snewman

review: Easy to install. Have had it for a week and, so far, meets all my expectations.
author: Jerry . Guttman

review: Love this product except sometimes the video will freeze or stop in intervals while watching.  Doesn't happen often but when it does it can be a bit frustrating.  Love how it turned my TV into a smart tv!
author: S. Tyler "S. Bowman"
